projects.description: A joke operating system themed on the popular video game "Among Us". Built on top of the Debian GNU/Linux distro with custom theming and tweaks, it's been viewed by over 1 million people on YouTube.
projects.title: AmogOS

projects.description: MCPI++ is a fork of the MCPI-Reborn mod. It's a modding platform for the aging video game "Minecraft: Pi Edition", designed to bring the game up to date with support for new OSes and a plethora of mods to make the game more enjoyable for beginners and veterans alike.
projects.title: MCPI++
Pi-Apps (Contributor)
projects.description: Pi-Apps is an app store for the Raspberry Pi ecosystem of SBCs running Linux. Pi-Apps puts the power of desktop computing in the hands of its users, allowing apps never supported before to work, like Minecraft and Zoom, while bringing attention to smaller communities like the MCPI Revival and WoR projects.

projects.title: ZipShip
projects.description: ZipShip is an innovative shipping optimizer. It finds the quickest and fastest ways to ship any given package to any destination on the globe, while reducing carbon emissions along the way. ZipShip was made in 48 hours for the TriHacks hackathon, and won the first place prize.

projects.title: Duinotize
projects.description: A new alternative to ads. Duinotize is a website monetizer, powered by Duino Coin, a cryptocurrency designed to be run on low-power devies like Arduinos. Ads are annoying and intrusive, but Duinotize runs completely in the background, using minimal amounts of energy and computer resources. It's easy to setup and manage for passive income, unlike programs such as AdSense.

MoneyBuddy is a financial assistance tool that makes you financially smarter, instead of working harder. By answering a quick survey, MoneyBuddy calculates a financial index score for you, shows how your spending habits compares to others, and shows ways you can save more money and increase your wealth. It was a hackathon project made in 48 hours for the OneHacksII hackathon.
projects.title: MoneyBuddy

awards.name: CYSF Top Junior Award
awards.description: Presented to the 1st place winner of the Calgary Youth Science Fair.
